name: Dusk Looms
description:
Explore the forbidden woods to save your medieval village but be careful to not lose yourself in the process. DESCRIPTION

Dusk Looms is a short single-player walking simulator inspired by gothic and medieval illustrations, aimed at players who enjoy atmospheric games. It focuses on exploration and navigation, creating a dark fairytale feeling.

The player will explore an expansive forest in search of the scarce ingredients hiding about it in order to craft a potion to cure the townspeople.  This task won’t be easy, however.  A dangerous creature lurks deep within this dark enchanting forest.  Make sure you make it out alive.
